buildCommand: build --type=NODE,FB_WWW_DEV react/index,react-dom/index,scheduler/index && cp build/facebook-www/React-dev.js build/node_modules/react/cjs/react.development.js && cp build/facebook-www/ReactDOM-dev.js build/node_modules/react-dom/cjs/react-dom.development.js && cp build/facebook-www/Scheduler-dev.js build/node_modules/scheduler/cjs/scheduler.development.js
